tool_description:
This API provides access to the data behind robtex.com tools.
You can look up reverse ip numbers, hostnames and domainnames. 
We are working to include more options
We will add a free, rate limited version here as soon as possible, check https://www.robtex.com/api/ for current options
name: Robtex
title: Robtex

api_list.name: ipinfo
api_list.description: Fetches information about who hosts an IP, and where it is located geographically. Consumes 5 credits
api_list.code:
import requests

url = "https://robtex.p.rapidapi.com/ipinfo/?q=163.191.183.131"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "robtex.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())
api_list.convert_code:
import requests

url = "https://robtex.p.rapidapi.com/ipinfo/?q={query}"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "robtex.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())

api_list.name: reverse
api_list.description: Reverse lookup of a name server, mail server or ip number. Consumes 1 credit per answer, minimum 1 per query. Use max to limit number of results returned and thereby max cost.

required_parameters.name: query
required_parameters.description: Domain name, host name or IP number

api_list.code:
import requests

url = "https://robtex.p.rapidapi.com/reverse/?q=ns1.yahoo.com&m=2"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "robtex.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())
api_list.convert_code:
import requests

url = "https://robtex.p.rapidapi.com/reverse/?q={query}&m={max}"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "robtex.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())
